cards.name: Almgrove Champion
cards.originalText:
Double strike
Cadence (Whenever you cast a spell, if its converted mana cost is greater than this creature's power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Almgrove Champion can only attack or block alone.

cards.name: Ardy's Study
cards.originalText:
Archive 5 (As this enters the battlefield, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this when the archived library is empty.)
You may play the top card of the archived library if it's a permanent card.
cards.text:

cards.name: Cranial Violation
cards.originalText:
Each player reveals their hand. Choose a creature card revealed this way. Its owner discards it.
{2}{B}{B}, Exile Cranial Violation and six other cards from your graveyard: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Dark Rite Cultist
cards.originalText: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life, Discard a card, Sacrifice Dark Rite Cultist and another creature: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

cards.originalText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 1 life.
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 1 life.

cards.name: Master Chef
cards.originalText:
When Master Chef enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
Sacrifice a Plant: You gain 3 life.

cards.name: Master of Tranquility
cards.originalText:
Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may switch Master of Tranquility's power and toughness until end of turn.

rulings.text: You can choose to let the pt switch occur first if you would like the Master to die.

cards.name: Merkurio's Familiar
cards.originalText:
Flying, haste
{X}{R}{R}, Exile an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard: Return Merkurio's Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
cards.text:
Flying, haste
{X}{R}{R}, Exile an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard: Return Merkurio's Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mystic Meddling
cards.originalText: Exile target spell. Then that spell's controller may cast a spell they own from outside the game that shares a type with the exiled card without paying its mana cost if able.

rulings.text: In a Constructed tournament, "outside the game" refers to that player's sideboard. In a Limited game, "outside the game" refers to all cards that player drafted that aren't in that player's deck or removed from that player's card pool. Otherwise, it refers to any card in MSEM.

cards.text: Exile target spell. Then that spell's controller may cast a spell they own from outside the game that shares a type with the exiled card without paying its mana cost if able.

cards.name: Nighthallow Ritual
cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X permanents.
Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying. If X is 5 or more, each opponent loses 5 life.
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X permanents.

cards.name: Pocket Aces
cards.originalText:
Choose up to four cards you own from outside the game and shuffle them into your library.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Rock
cards.originalText:
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

cards.name: Ryukami, the First Sovereign
cards.originalText:
Eminence — As long as Ryukami, the First Sovereign is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other legendary spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Flying
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Saigura Tam
cards.originalText:
[+1]: Create three 1/1 white Cat Warrior creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
[+1]: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste and vigilance until end of turn.
[-4]: Saigura Tam deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Savage Congregation
cards.originalText:
Search your library for a creature card with power 4 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead search your library for up to four creature cards with total power 4 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.originalText: Scorch deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.text: Scorch deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Serene Prayer
cards.originalText:
Vanishing 10 (This permanent enters the battlefield with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
If you would lose 1 or more life other than to pay a cost, instead remove that many time counters from Serene Prayer.

rulings.text: If you also have glory counters, you choose which prevention effect to apply first.

cards.name: Suisei the Southern Star
cards.originalText:
Flying
Suisei the Southern Star gets +1/+1 for each comet counter you have.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with converted mana cost greater than the number of comet counters you have, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Suisei from your graveyard to the battlefield, then you get a comet counter.

cards.name: Taiyohata Champion
cards.originalText:
Flash
First strike
If you cast Taiyohata Champion during your declare attackers step, it enters the battlefield tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: If you cast Taiyohata Champion during your declare attackers step, it will not trigger any "Whenever a creature attacks" abilities.
